welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hikawadai, where time seems to stand still in the midst of a bustling city. Known for its rich cultural heritage and charming streets, we invite you to immerse yourselves in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and let Hikawadai captivate you.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kumamoto Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kumamoto Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Amakusa Airfield is a small and modern facility that serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Amakusa Airfield is a separate building located next to the main terminal, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.
